Introduction:
In an era where technological advancements continue to blur the line between artificial intelligence (AI) and human intellect, the short stories of Ken Liu’s "The Perfect Match" and Isaac Asimov’s "The Bicentennial Man" prompt us to reevaluate the boundaries that separate artificial and natural intelligence.
